title: [经济]Shop——一商店插件[1.9]
author: xjk698
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1582952890 于 2017-9-16 19:40 编辑 

1.简介:通过这款插件，你可以在服务器上建立一个商店，以便玩家们出售、购买到任何东西。这款插件是高度可定制的，允许你修改它的大部分功能。命令、NPC和告示牌都可以被用来建立商店。

2.需要:-Spigot1.8.3或者更高-Vaul 附属插件-Vault前置插件-Java 7以上
3.插件特性＊可以创建NPC＊高度可定制的菜单＊自带权限＊可命令运行＊告示牌选项＊物品出售＊商店创建简便化＊支持所有物品＊支持Citizens插件＊支持PlaceholderAPI＊可建立无限多的商店页面＊自带商店页面编辑器＊所有的操作都在游戏中进行＊修改大部分玩家能够看到的信息
4.汉化图片---见最后---
5.命令、权限shop.* - Gives access to all shop commands
shop.page.* - Gives access to all shop page commands
shop.npc.* - Gives access to all shop npc commands
shop.citizen.* - Gives access to all shop citizen commands
shop.blacklist.* - Gives access to all shop blacklist commands

shop.use - /shop
shop.sign.break - Allows you to break Shop signs
shop.sign.create - Allows you to create Shop signs
shop.backup - /shop backup
shop.save - /shop save
shop.debug - /shop debug
shop.reload - /shop reload
shop.console - /shop console help (Also allows access to all console commands)

shop.page.create - /shop page create
shop.page.delete - /shop page delete
shop.page.manage - /shop page manage
shop.page.edit - /shop page edit
shop.page.size - /shop page size
shop.page.copy - /shop page copy
shop.page.title - /shop page title
shop.page.import - /shop page import
shop.page.clear - /shop page clear
shop.page.list - /shop page list
shop.page.add - /shop page add <cost> <sell>
shop.page.open - /shop page open <page>
shop.page.open.pagenamehere - /shop page open pagenamehere

shop.npc.create - /shop npc create
shop.npc.delete - /shop npc delete
shop.npc.manage - /shop npc manage
shop.npc.name - /shop npc name
shop.npc.page - /shop npc page
shop.npc.type - /shop npc type
shop.npc.find - /shop npc find
shop.npc.respawn - /shop npc respawn
shop.npc.list - /shop npc list
shop.npc.nameplate - /shop npc nameplate
shop.npc.permission.add - /shop npc permission add <permission>
shop.npc.permission.remove - /shop npc permission remove <permission>
shop.npc.permission.clear - /shop npc permission clear

shop.blacklist.list - /shop blacklist list
shop.blacklist.add - /shop blacklist add
shop.blacklist.remove - /shop blacklist remove
shop.blacklist.bypass.WORLDNAME - Allows you to use /shop in the blacklisted world specified

shop.worth.set - /shop worth set <amount>
shop.worth.list - /shop worth list
shop.worth.item - /shop worth

shop.citizen.page - /shop citizen page <page>
shop.citizen.permission.add - /shop citizen permission add <permission>
shop.citizen.permission.remove - /shop citizen permission remove <permission>
shop.citizen.permission.clear - /shop citizen permission clear

6.变量
%shop_previous% and %shop_current% are hooked into PlaceholderAPI.

%shop_previous% // The previous page the player was on
%shop_current% // The current page the player is on

%worth% // The amount the items that have been added to the page are worth
%player%
%balance%
%page%
%page_title%
%cooldown%
